hero.title: JRM Business Development
hero.subtitle: Strategic commercial partner for industrial and manufacturing value chains in the EU
hero.statement: Not a broker. Not an agent. But an extension of your team for growth, sourcing, and commercial decisions.

paragraphs.p1: JRM Business Development is a Slovenian company acting as a strategic business development partner for manufacturing companies. We specialize in connecting buyers and suppliers within industrial and manufacturing value chains across the EU.
paragraphs.p2: The company is founded and managed by operators with extensive experience in the automotive industry, industrial automation, and B2B sales. Our approach is based on a deep understanding of manufacturing processes, technical requirements, and commercial dynamics.
paragraphs.p3: Our focus is not short-term transactions, but long-term partnerships. We act as an extension of your team - from opportunity identification, through RFQ processes, to stabilization of serial production.
